name: SWAMP WIZARD and the fight for WIZARD SWAMP
name_original: SWAMP WIZARD and the fight for WIZARD SWAMP
description:
Clash with the dastardly guards! Drive them from your home with magic and wit! But be wary of their arrows, and the resident Alligator!

Controls: Left click to fire a blast of swamp magic. Space bar to teleport. Mouse will aim.

Goal: Collect all 3 orbs and make it back to your house.

Art done by Bea

Music done by Hugelogan: https://soundcloud.com/krugbit 

Code done by Nathan
